descriptionHtml:
[size=5]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC[/size]

This mod adds a one-handed (and slightly shorter) version the weapon in dragonborn dlc.

[s]Currently only available through console commands but i'll add smithing and tempering recipes soon.[/s]
Can now be smithed and tempered.
Smithing requires steel smithing perk, 4 steel ingots, 2 leather strips.
Tempering requires 1 steel ingot and arcane blacksmith perk.

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
